document_data.name: Inrath Mirandor
document_data.mainbody:
'''Inrath Mirandor''' was the founder and first king of the kingdom of [[Impiltur]]. He started the [[Mirandor Dynasty]] of [[Old Impiltur]].

Born the son of [[Ornrath]] in {{Yearlink|-106}}, he crowned himself king in the [[-74 DR|Year of Splendor, −74 DR]], and founded the kingdom of Impiltur. His reign ended in {{Yearlink|-47}} and he was succeeded by his eldest son, [[Inrath Mirandor II|Iranth II]].<ref name=tGHotR-p58>
